hero.mainDescription: A design-developer hybrid who loves turning ideas into beautiful, functional digital experiences. Fluent in both pixels and code, with the ability to dream up the perfect user interface and actually build it too. The bridge between design and development that helps great ideas come to life on screen.
hero.location: Chattanooga, TN | Anywhere with a wifi connection

projects.title: Legacybox Cloud
projects.description: Legacybox Cloud is a secure streaming platform that delivers digitized family memories to customers after their analog media is professionally converted.
